view.label: Productos por familia Periodo
view.sqlSentence: SELECT invoice_detail.item, product.name description, SUM(IF(invoice.issue_date BETWEEN ? AND ?, TRUNCATE(invoice_detail.taxable_base, 2), 0)), SUM(IF(invoice.issue_date BETWEEN ? AND ?, 0, TRUNCATE(invoice_detail.taxable_base, 2))) FROM invoice_detail, invoice, pcategory, item, product WHERE product.id = item.product AND invoice_detail.item = item.id AND invoice_detail.invoice = invoice.id AND product.category = pcategory.id AND pcategory.id = ? AND ( invoice.issue_date BETWEEN ? AND ? OR invoice.issue_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(?, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE_SUB(?, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) ) AND invoice.type = ? GROUP BY invoice_detail.item
